code: import axios from'axios';import{jwtDecode}from'jwt-decode';axios.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){const decodedToken=jwtDecode(token);const currentTime=Date.now()/1000;if(decodedToken.exp<currentTime){localStorage.removeItem('token');window.location.href='/login';}else{config.headers['Authorization']='Bearer '+token;}}return config;},error=>{return Promise.reject(error);});export default axios;
